üé¨ Grid View Feature Demo ‚úì IMPLEMENTED

This demonstration shows the new Slide Overview / Grid View feature implemented in MarkDeck.

‚ú® Feature Overview

The grid view provides a bird's-eye view of all slides in your presentation, allowing quick navigation and overview.

How to Use

Press O at any time during your presentation to toggle the grid overview.

  • ‚úÖ Visual Slide Previews: See miniature versions of all slides at once
  • ‚úÖ Current Slide Indicator: Highlighted with blue border and glow effect
  • ‚úÖ Quick Navigation: Click any slide to jump directly to it
  • ‚úÖ Slide Numbers: Each thumbnail shows its slide number
  • ‚úÖ Responsive Grid: Adapts to screen size automatically
  • ‚úÖ Hover Effects: Slides lift and highlight on hover

üîß Implementation Details

Files Modified

  • markdeck/static/index.html: Added grid overlay container and help text
  • markdeck/static/style.css: Added comprehensive grid styling (~160 lines)
  • markdeck/static/slides.js: Added toggleGrid() and buildGrid() methods

Key Features

  • Responsive CSS Grid layout (adapts to desktop/tablet/mobile)
  • Smooth CSS transitions for hover effects
  • Dynamic slide content rendering using marked.js
  • Click handlers for navigation
  • Current slide indicator with visual highlighting

üß™ Testing Instructions

To Test Locally

# Start the presentation
markdeck present examples/features.md

# In the browser:
# 1. Press 'O' to open grid view
# 2. Click any slide to jump to it
# 3. Press 'O' again or 'Esc' to close

Expected Behavior

  • Grid overlay appears with all slides visible as thumbnails
  • Current slide has blue border and glow effect
  • Hovering over slides shows lift animation and border highlight
  • Clicking a slide navigates to it and closes the grid
  • Grid is scrollable for presentations with many slides
